notes.title: JavaScript essentials
notes.body: Get comfortable with all basic JavaScript concepts: variables, loops, arrays, branching, objects, functions, scopes, prototypes etc

notes.title: Refresh HTML and CSS
notes.body: Need to refresh HTML and CSS concepts, after learning some JavaScript. Maybe get to know CSS Grid and PostCSS, they seem to be trending.

notes.title: Get comfy with Frontend frameworks
notes.body: First must get some general knowledge about frameworks, then maybe try each one for a week or so. Need to choose between React, Vue and Angular, by reading articles and watching videos.

notes.title: Winter clothes
notes.body: Winter is coming! Need some really warm clothes: shoes, sweater, hat, jacket, scarf etc. Maybe should get a set of sportwear as well so I'll be able to do some excercises in the park.
